entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:51 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:51 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:51 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
